name: Winter Fashion - Beauty Spa and Makeup Salon
name_original: Winter Fashion - Beauty Spa and Makeup Salon
description:
It is the Winter Fashion Season !!!!
Dress up in lovely winter attire after enjoying a relaxing day at the spa with a complete makeover at the salon.
That is what every girl loves !!!
Winter Fashion - Beauty Spa and Makeup Salon is a fun game that will keep you entertained for hours with its countless make up and dressup combos.
Choose from various hair styles, hair colors, lip gloss, blushes, eye color lenses, eye lashes, eyebrow types and even skin tones to create your own style statement.
Once you are done with the makeup, there are many jackets, caps, muffs and scarves to make you look your best this season.
There is much more!
You get to experience an amazing facial at the spa. Enjoy this step by step process in a mini game style setting.
And after you are happy with your creation, there is a camera for you to capture it as a photo to share it with your friends!

So don't wait! Indulge in a beautiful makeover that you always wanted!

Features
1. Three in One! Makeup Salon plus Facial Spa plus Fashionable Dressup
2. Variety of awesome makeup and dressup options
3. Facility to take photo of your creations and store it for sharing with friends
4. Step by step facial process for a fun spa experience
5. Full game for FREE. All makeup and dressup choices available. No in app purchase required.
